metadata.title: CVE-2023-52802 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iio: adc: stm32-adc: harden against NULL pointer deref in stm32_adc_probe()of_match_device() may fail and returns a NULL pointer.In practice there is no known reasonable way to trigger this, butin case one is added in future, harden the code by adding the check

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
